TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WCFBuildProvider extends System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider

Docs.summary: Generates proxy class code for Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.WCFBuildProvider> uses mapping files (.svcmap) at the root level of the Web application that contains WCF service references. The mapping files specify the services for which proxy class source code must be generated. The generated proxy class is then compiled with the other resources during the Web application compilation phase.
The inherited <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.VirtualPath%2A> property is internally defined and points to the Web application root directory where the .svcmap files reside.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void GenerateCode(class System.Web.Compilation.AssemblyBuilder assemblyBuilder) cil managed

Docs.param: An instance of the object that the generated proxy code must be added to. This instance is provided by ASP.NET at run time.
Docs.summary: Generates the service proxy class source code and adds it to the specified assembly builder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method searches for .svcmap files in the Web application root directory. If files are found, the method generates the source code of a proxy class for the related services into the specified `assemblyBuilder`.

block.para:
Typically, this method parses the .svcmap mapping files and adds the generated source code to the specified object. You can contribute source code to the assembly in the form of a object or a CodeDOM graph.
For more information, see .
